# MLTaskState.failed

**Case**

The state of a machine learning task that has terminated due to an error.

## Declaration

```swift
case failed
```

## Final states

- **MLTaskState.completed**: The state of a machine learning task that has finished successfully.

items.description: The state of a machine learning task that has finished successfully.
items.name: MLTaskState.completed

title: MLTaskState.failed
